hero.title: Smart HR Agency
hero.subtitle1: Smart HR Agency is a unique recruitment agency created by IT professionals with 20 years of experience in the development of large Internet projects. The agency is a part of the international holding ABC Group.
hero.subtitle2: Our work is based on the SMART approach, automation, and optimization of processes. We are result-oriented and are particularly experienced in development, support, sales, digital marketing, performance marketing, and affiliate marketing.

specialists.title: To specialists
specialists.description: We can help you maximize your potential by finding a job that is relevant to your experience, competencies, personality, and life goals. We provide free development, education, and career consulting.

companies.title: To companies
companies.description: We will solve your recruitment issues and offer guarantees for our services. The convenience, efficiency, and quality of our service, along with your satisfaction in working with us, are the primary benchmarks for evaluating the success of our business.

partners.title: To partners
partners.description: HR and recruiting agencies, specialists, freelancers, HR managers, executives, recruiters, and owners of groups and communities across various subjects can boost their income by partnering with SmartHR Agency.

how_we_work.title: How we work
how_we_work.step1: We learn all the details about the candidate you are looking for
how_we_work.step2: We search, interview, and test potential candidates
how_we_work.step3: We provide you with the contact information of suitable candidates
how_we_work.step4: The chosen candidate starts a probationary period
how_we_work.step5: At the end of the 2 weeks of working with the candidate, you pay for our services.
